name: v_app_demo
description: A simple chat demo for Socket.IO

scripts.start_app: bash -c " npm run set_mode_live  " &&  bash -c " npm run build  " &&  bash -c " npm run start_server  "
scripts.start_dev: bash -c " npm run set_mode_dev  " && start bash -c " nodemon --exec npm run build  " &&  bash -c " npm run start_server  "
scripts.build: bash -c " npx webpack " && bash -c " node _dev/auto_browser_refresh/server.updateBuildInfoFile.js ; "  && bash -c " node-sass -r src/style -o dist/style  "
